title: IModelDocExtension.SketchOffsetOnSurface
description: Creates a Euclidean sketch offset from selected edges of a face or surface.
signature:
System.Boolean SketchOffsetOnSurface( 
   System.Double
Offset
,
   System.Boolean
Reverse
,
   System.Boolean
UseFront
,
   System.Boolean
MakeConstruct
)

parameters.name: Reverse
parameters.description: True to reverse the 3D sketch, false to not

parameters.name: UseFront
parameters.description: Although not currently used, must be set to true

parameters.name: MakeConstruct
parameters.description: True to make the 3D sketch construction geometry after offsetting, false to not

returns: True if the 3D sketch is created, false if not
remarks:
To create a geodesic sketch offset along the curvature of a surface, use
IModelDocExtension::GeodesicSketchOffset
.
Before calling this method, call
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
for each edge to offset and set Append to true and Mark to 1.
After calling this method, call
ISketchManager::InsertSketch
to rebuild the model with the 3D sketch.
